headline: Applied Materials CEO Bought the Stock Dip After the Tariff Hit
summary: Applied Materials President and CEO Gary E. Dickerson just bought nearly $7 million of shares of the chipmaking-equipment firm.

headline: Stressful Markets, But Lots Of Opportunities In Tech
summary: Sara Awad from Tech Stock Pros returns to discuss market uncertainty, volatility, and the tech sector.

headline: Lam Research (LRCX) Surges 5.3%: Is This an Indication of Further Gains?
summary: Lam Research (LRCX) was a big mover last session on higher-than-average trading volume. The latest trend in earnings estimate revisions might help the stock continue moving higher in the near term.

headline: Applied Materials (AMAT) Moves 4.7% Higher: Will This Strength Last?
summary: Applied Materials (AMAT) witnessed a jump in share price last session on above-average trading volume. The latest trend in earnings estimate revisions for the stock suggests that there could be more strength down the road.
